price: ለእነሱም ገነቶችን በሥራቸው ወንዞች የሚፈሱባቸውን በውስጣቸው ዘውታሪዎች ሲኾኑ አላህ አዘጋጅቶላቸዋል፡፡ ይህ ታላቅ ማግኘት ነው፡፡
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
